snippet: JUDGE--James J.,age 89, died in Yanceyville, NC on July 13, 2016. He formerly resided in East Hampton, NY and Garden City, NY. He was preceded in death by sons Paul and Peter. He is survived by five children - Jim, Jr. (Carol), Geoffrey, Jonathan,...
lead_paragraph: JUDGE--James J.,age 89, died in Yanceyville, NC on July 13, 2016. He formerly resided in East Hampton, NY and Garden City, NY. He was preceded in death by sons Paul and Peter. He is survived by five children - Jim, Jr. (Carol), Geoffrey, Jonathan, Sheila and Janet. He is also survived by 10 grandchildren and six great-grandchildren. Served for many years in the public relations field in both private and governmental sectors. He was also actively involved with the local Merchant Marine Veterans organization. Visitation will be held from 4-7pm at the O'Shea Funeral Home, 603 Wantagh Avenue, Wantagh, NY (exit 28 N SS Pkwy) on Thursday, July 21. A Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Friday, July 22, at St. Martin of Tours Church, Bethpage, NY at 10am with burial to follow in St. Charles Cemetery in Farmingdale, NY. www.osheafuneral.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JUDGE, JAMES J.
